title: WTB beater common - closed, found one
author: tsp06

posts.post_title: WTB beater common - closed, found one
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for a beater common to add to my fledgling  collection.  I would like to spend a max of $20 with shipping.  I'm fine with PWE as the delivery method.  Please PM with your card details and asking price as well as image(s) if possible.  

Thanks in advance.
